article.title: Template Project
article.para: This is the online presence of the Template Project.

The purpose of this page is to give a permanent overview on the project. The main directions of this page are:
Product Documentation. The documentation will be developed in parallel with the Timma development, so the documentation should be a window on the status of the project.
Development Process. The development process will be a permanent concern during this project and therefore an excellent candidate for documentation.
